XML Format: ValueSet-laboratory-and-vital-signs-observations

Raw xml 


<ValueSet xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="laboratory-and-vital-signs-observations"/>
  <meta>
    <profile value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/shareablevalueset"/>
  </meta>
  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>
    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><h2>IPSLabResultsObservation</h2><div><p>This value set includes (at the end) some clinical observations, which may be relevant in a lab report (body weight, temperature ….).Value Set Definition:LOINC {  {    COMPONENT not containing the word &quot;panel&quot;    STATUS in {ACTIVE}    CLASSTYPE in {1}    ORDER_OBS in {Observation, Both}    CLASS exclude {CHALSKIN, H&amp;P.HX.LAB, H&amp;P.HX, LABORDERS, NR STATS, PATH.PROTOCOLS.*}  }  UNION  {    COMPONENT not ( containing the word &quot;panel&quot; OR starting with &quot;can pronounce&quot; )    STATUS in {ACTIVE}    CLASSTYPE in {2}    ORDER_OBS in {Observation, Both}    SYSTEM = ^Patient  }}</p>
</div><p>This value set includes codes from the following code systems:</p><ul/></div>
  </text>
  <url
       value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/ValueSet/laboratory-and-vital-signs-observations"/>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <version value="1"/>
  <name value="IPSLabResultsObservation"/>
  <title value="IPS Results Observation Laboratory"/>
  <status value="draft"/>
  <experimental value="false"/>

               value=" This value set includes (at the end) some clinical observations, which may be relevant in a lab report (body weight, temperature ….).Value Set Definition:LOINC {  {    COMPONENT not containing the word &quot;panel&quot;    STATUS in {ACTIVE}    CLASSTYPE in {1}    ORDER_OBS in {Observation, Both}    CLASS exclude {CHALSKIN, H&amp;P.HX.LAB, H&amp;P.HX, LABORDERS, NR STATS, PATH.PROTOCOLS.*}  }  UNION  {    COMPONENT not ( containing the word &quot;panel&quot; OR starting with &quot;can pronounce&quot; )    STATUS in {ACTIVE}    CLASSTYPE in {2}    ORDER_OBS in {Observation, Both}    SYSTEM = ^Patient  }}"/>
